name: Faux
description: Play as Faux, the artificial human and pass the difficult challenges that lie ahead.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3-8145U Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 250 MB available space
